entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Alexandria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:35 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then light this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 06:44 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 06:44 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
